short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension for submitting issues

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: N2 Support Case Chrome Extension is designed to streamline the process of submitting technical support cases directly from a userâ€™s browser. It enables users to capture and include critical information such as screenshots, the current page URL, and their email address automatically in their support requests. This information assists support teams in quickly understanding and addressing the issues reported. The extension ensures that all data is collected securely and only with the user's explicit interaction, emphasizing ease of use, efficiency, and privacy compliance. It is an essential tool for users needing to communicate detailed case scenarios to support teams, enhancing the overall efficiency of issue resolution.
